NAME.Nominative: Finding of the relics of the Venerable Job, Abbot and Wonderworker of Pochaev (1659)

SAINT.LIFE: The Monk Job of Pochaev died on 28 October 1651. On 28 August 1833 the relics of the Monk Job were solemnly opened for general veneration. In the year 1902 the Holy Synod decreed on this day to carry the holy relics of the Monk Job round the Uspensk cathedral of the Pochaev Lavra-monastery after the Divine Liturgy.
